reviewText: Very pleased with this product saw this movie in theaters when i was little and its still as good as i remember glad to see it as a package deal everywhere else the first one was the same the same price as this package so this is a very good deal thanks Amazon
This movie is a classic in our family, so it was a must have on my daughter's video collection shelf.

We just love this Gremlins Part I and Part II DVD, never get bored of watching this movies many many times. We will continue to do so till this DVD wears out! We can't wait until our son is old enough to watch this movies, he probably will enjoy it much more than we do. :)

What movie is better than a cute little mogwhite getting wet than sprouting a ton of little fur balls?  Well no movie gets better than that, and that's what the Gremlins is.  A cute little creature sprouted a bunch of little punk gremlins running around everywhere causing chaos at every corner.  There was a lot of comedy in this one, the gremlins were hilarious, absolutely hilarious.  I must say that this is a must see dvd.  Plus you get the second one with it, which is even a sweeter deal.  The first one itself is worth the 20 bucks.  This is a must get pack, gauranteed!
the first DVD didn't work, the second one played but it was corny
A FUN MOVIE AND NOT TOO SCARY FOR YOUNGER CHILDREN

well gremlins are about these little fuzzie creatures (Mogwai) that turn into vicious little monsters if they eat food after midnight and will multiply when wet. its a movie with thrill and excitment. if your in it for the cute Mogwai on the cover then this movies not for you but if your in it just to see a movie that has action in it with phenominon in it then this is the movie for you (in short if you liked ET then you like this movie, but if you don't you might still like this movie look at me i don' tlike ET and this movie is one of my favorites.

The director that brought us many great movies such as Jaws to Saving Private Ryan. Gremlins isn't a movie with these potentials but when seeing it you can laugh and love the story of this small town being corrupted. In the sequel to the first Gremlins you get an amazing story as you got with the first taking place in the city that never sleeps. If you love movies The Gremlins dvd are movies to see and seeng how a director can give you action and comedy in a story such as this.

All time favorite movie that has to be added to the library!  When my grandchildren get a little older we'll watch it together.  I remember going to see this movie years ago.  My friends and I thought it was scary, but we found that it was funny and entertaining (the gremlins are little "monsters").  If you get a chance please get the set; you can steal away in your home and enjoy it alone.  That's if you enjoy comedy.
Purchased this DVD to replace the ones I already had in VHS format.
LOVE THE STEEL BOX AND THE MOVIES ARE TIMELESS AND WORTH THE $$$$$!!!!Bring gizmo home! You will love them YES!IYES YES
i love this idea every one wants to know where i got the  this movie love it  love love love this
This is a great family movie that your kids will really enjoy. The theater scene and the mall scene were fabulous.

I bought this movie for my grandson.  I am very familiar with the movie and knew he would enjoy it.  However I was very disappointed with the quality.  Half way through the movie the picture started to get snowy and started to fade away.  Eventually the picture came back and then started to jump.  Usually I am very happy with the quality of the movies I order.  Not this time.
Who doesn't love Gremlins?! My daughter (3yrs) was cracking up right along with me and my husband. We even watched the commentary, which was very interesting

It came in good condition and arrived much earlier than expected which was great! But it is a region 2 DVD which most american DVD players won't play. I kept it, as I need a new DVD player anyway so I will get one that is region free but I wish they would have made a point in stating this in the drscription
My daughter had never seen Gremlins movies and I couldn't wait to share it with her. The first movie is way better then the 2nd, but she finds the 2nd one not as scary.
I bought these for my oldest son as he likes watching them. They were sold at a great price and delivered fast. My son is very happy. Thank you Zach Galligan and Amazon.com

I watched this movie when I was little, but wanted my daughters to see it as well. So we bought both dvds and she loves them. I like to watch them with her because its cool movie. Love this movie, one of my all time favorites.

I haven't had the opportunity to veiw the movie yet.
But I saw it as a kid, and loved it.
The Bluray did arrive in a timely fashion, and the only complaint I had was with the way it is case wise.
The case it comes in, is made of aluminum or tin, and plastic,
It is bulkier then necessary.
And the plastic insert that the DVD's fit into is kind of flimsy as it comes apart from the case if you don't open it very slowly.

Super nice double steelbook Gremlins 1 and 2 in the same steelbook, very nice looking great films and the steelbook is very nice and high quality, looks great in the collection, recommend this steelbook to everyone.
Bought them for my son and they are just what he wanted.  He is into old movies and shows and always looking for dvds.  These are just as advertised, great condition and work perfectly.
It was okay I got my package but it was all riped up but I really like the movies both of them I watch them over and over
Scrumptious.......cute......little scary sometimes. I love this movies very much.....since I have a few of Steven. Spielberg collection......so this will add to great collections
The item came in excellent conditions, well packed, very nice NEW, no defect, as i expected. . . . .

we have watched these over and over. this is a great movie and the price for both movies was so worth-it.  these occassionally come on TV but with the disks we don't have to fuss with commercials and can rewind, pause, and enjoy the movies on our time.
My nephews love these fury little creatures and they loved the movies. Great price and well worth it to see the smiles on their faces when watching.  Would highly recommend them to everyone.
both like I remember them and good glad the I got them haven't seen in a long time, and i always find the movies i want on this site.
I had to have this in my collection.  the movies did came in their own dvd case in great shape.  made my order on Saturday and got the product on Tuesday.  sweet.
My daughter-in-law has always liked these movies so I got them for her for Christmas. She was so happy that now she can enjoy watching them whenever she wants.
Great service! My package was exactly as it stated & was received on time. I am Completely satisfied & would use again.
i bought these movies for my son for Christmas. he loooovvvveeeddd them!!!! i watched these movies when i was younger. priceless.....

I ordered this and all I received was Gremlins 2 - The New Batch.  I contacted Amazon and they did refund my $$, but the seller never offered to make this right at all.  I ended up ordering this from another vender.  I was very disappointed in this order.  Also, the seller claimed this was "new" and it wasn't.  It didn't even have the plastic wrap around it!
I got this to give as a gift, don't know the quality of the product. It all looked good. Didn't view them. Did receive  in a timely manor. Thank you for that.
These movies are wonderful. I remember watching them when I was younger and they are such fun to still watch. My son also enjoys watching these. I recommend these to everyone to enjoy.
Definitely cute movies, fun to watch now and remember loving them when I was little.  This is a great deal here, though beware, the cases are the paperback kind, if you care at all.
